backend/main.mo: Defines transaction, balance, stats, and access-control logic with storage maps and role enforcement for a financial tracking canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report linking a UI color‑coding update to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short descriptions of numerous frontend files for documentation or build‑planning purposes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling PIN‑based offline auth, loading states, cache clearing, and rendering the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/BackupRestore.ts: UI component providing backup and restore operations with success/error alerts, file input handling, and collapsible sections.
frontend/src/components/BalanceCards.tsx: Displays financial overview cards using balance and stats queries, with refresh support and navigation to add transactions.
frontend/src/components/DailyTracking.ts: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/DaywiseTransacti: Displays daily transactions with date selection, shows derived totals, and lets users save per-day deduction values to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/EditTransactionD: Modal dialog for editing an existing transaction, pre-filling fields and submitting updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/FilterTransactio: Filters transactions by date range, computes per-day totals and deductions, and displays results in a table.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with branding, logout, data backup, restore, and clear-data controls.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTransacti: Displays monthly transactions with filters for type, search, and derived rows, merging real and computed entries.
frontend/src/components/OpeningBalancesF: Form to add or update opening balances, loading existing data and submitting via query mutations.
frontend/src/components/PinAuth.tsx: Handles PIN setup and verification with UI feedback, confirmation flow, and reset support.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting user to enter and save their name during profile setup.
Form to create transactions with type selection, date picker, validation, and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Displays, filters, edits, and deletes transactions using derived rows and dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and logout operations.
frontend/src/hooks/usePinAuth.ts: Provides PIN-based local authentication with setup, verification, session restore, and reset using hashed PINs in local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Manages local storage caching and React Query interactions for transactions, balances, user data, and opening balances with bigint handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, component overrides, animations, and enhanced UI styling for calendars and dropdowns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with tabbed navigation for overview, adding transactions, history, filtering, and date-based views.
frontend/src/utils/derivedTransactions.t: Generates and merges UI‑only derived rows such as 10% savings and cheeti deductions using local storage values.
Maps transaction types to incoming/outgoing directions and supplies corresponding color and icon classes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, extended animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including state version, feature lists, and pending feature requests.
